description: Integrate powerful data scraping, content processing, and AI capabilities into your applications. Leverage a wide range of tools for document conversion, web scraping, and knowledge management to enhance your workflows. Execute code securely and access various data APIs to enrich your projects with real-time information.

dumplingApiKey.description: Your Dumpling AI API key for authentication.

capabilities.name: get-youtube-transcript
capabilities.description: Extract transcripts from YouTube videos with optional parameters for timestamps and language preferences.

capabilities.name: search
capabilities.description: Perform Google web searches with customizable parameters.

capabilities.name: get-autocomplete
capabilities.description: Retrieve Google autocomplete suggestions for a query.

capabilities.name: search-maps
capabilities.description: Search Google Maps for locations and businesses.

capabilities.name: search-places
capabilities.description: Search for places with detailed business information.

capabilities.name: search-news
capabilities.description: Search for news articles across multiple sources.

capabilities.name: get-google-reviews
capabilities.description: Retrieve Google reviews for businesses or places.

capabilities.name: scrape
capabilities.description: Extract and parse content from any web page.

capabilities.name: crawl
capabilities.description: Recursively crawl websites and extract content.

capabilities.name: extract
capabilities.description: Extract structured data from web pages using AI-powered instructions.

capabilities.name: screenshot
capabilities.description: Capture screenshots of web pages with customizable settings.

capabilities.name: doc-to-text
capabilities.description: Convert various document formats to plain text.

capabilities.name: convert-to-pdf
capabilities.description: Convert various file formats to PDF.

capabilities.name: merge-pdfs
capabilities.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document.

capabilities.name: trim-video
capabilities.description: Trim videos to a specific duration.

capabilities.name: extract-document
capabilities.description: Extract structured data from documents based on a prompt.

capabilities.name: extract-image
capabilities.description: Extract structured data from images based on a prompt.

capabilities.name: extract-audio
capabilities.description: Extract structured data from audio files based on a prompt.

capabilities.name: extract-video
capabilities.description: Extract structured data from videos based on a prompt.

capabilities.name: read-pdf-metadata
capabilities.description: Extract metadata from PDF files.

capabilities.name: write-pdf-metadata
capabilities.description: Write metadata to PDF files.

capabilities.name: generate-agent-completion
capabilities.description: Generate AI text completions with customizable parameters.

capabilities.name: search-knowledge-base
capabilities.description: Search a knowledge base for relevant information.

capabilities.name: add-to-knowledge-base
capabilities.description: Add new text resources to a knowledge base.

capabilities.name: generate-ai-image
capabilities.description: Generate AI images from text prompts.

capabilities.name: run-js-code
capabilities.description: Execute JavaScript code in a sandbox.

capabilities.name: run-python-code
capabilities.description: Execute Python code in a sandbox.
